ComicInfo.Title: Where the Rubber Meets the Road
ComicInfo.Series: DC Horror Presents: Sgt. Rock vs. the Army of the Dead
ComicInfo.Summary:
SGT. FRANK ROCK--NAZI SOLDIER?
Worry not, the ol' sarge hasn't allied with the Axis, but he's hoping to trick the Nazis into thinking he has. Easy Company's found themselves behind enemy lines, disguised as German infantry, and they're blasting their way through a horde of zombies to get at the big man himself: Hitler!
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-07-15 20:48:07. [CVDB961696]
ComicInfo.CoverArtist: Brad Anderson, Evan Shaner, Francesco Francavilla, Gary Frank
ComicInfo.Editor: Alex Galer, Ben Meares, Katie Kubert
ComicInfo.Characters: Bulldozer, Four-Eyes, Little Sure Shot, Sgt. Rock, Short Round, Tin
ComicInfo.Teams: Easy Company, Nazis, United States Army, Zombies
